MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IConnectedStandbyDataSource> UseConnectedStandbyData (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IConnectedStandbyDataSource> UseConnectedStandbyData(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseConnectedStandbyData (trace As ITraceSource) As IPendingResult(Of IConnectedStandbyDataSource)
static member UseConnectedStandbyData : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IConnectedStandbyDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about the system entering and exiting connected standby.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about the system entering and exiting connected standby.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the CS Summary table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about CPU C-states.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about CPU C-states.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the CPU Idle States table (when Type is Actual).

Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about device D-states.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about estimated per-process energy usage from Energy Estimation Engine.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about estimated per-process energy usage from Energy Estimation Engine.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Energy Estimation Engine Summary (by Process) table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about measured energy usage from Energy Meter Interface (EMI).
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about measured energy usage from Energy Meter Interface (EMI).
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Energy Estimation Engine (by Emi) table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IPlatformIdleStateDataSource> UsePlatformIdleStates (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IPlatformIdleStateDataSource> UsePlatformIdleStates(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UsePlatformIdleStates (trace As ITraceSource) As IPendingResult(Of IPlatformIdleStateDataSource)
static member UsePlatformIdleStates : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IPlatformIdleStateDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about the target and actual platform idle states of a system.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about the target and actual platform idle states of the system.

remarks.para: Target platform idle states are decided by the operating system software, while actual platform idle states are determined by hardware, and the two values may not always match.
Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Platform Idle State table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about system power configuration.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about system power configuration.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via System Configuration, Power Settings.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about the frequency at which processors ran.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about the frequency at which processors ran.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Processor Frequency table (when Type is Actual).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IProcessorParkingDataSource> UseProcessorParkingData (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IProcessorParkingDataSource> UseProcessorParkingData(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed

static member UseProcessorParkingData : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Power.IProcessorParkingDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about which processors were parked or unparked.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about which processors were parked or unparked.

remarks.para: Processor parking removes a processor from active usage to save power.
Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Processor Parking State table.

Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about the maximum allowed number of unparked processors.

remarks.para: Processor parking removes a processor from active usage to save power.
